register-preview.text_1: A platform that respects your privacy and safety. Your wellbeing is our priority! uSupport provides personalized and discreet psychological care.
register-preview.text_2: uSupport is a mental health, psychosocial and wellbeing platform designed for young people and their carers where privacy and safety is a priority.
register-preview.text_3: Be your best self! Your mental health matters.

notifications.heading: Notifications
notifications.consultation_booking: Your consultation with <0>{{providerName}}</0> was <0>scheduled</0> successfully for <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_reschedule: You successfully <0>rescheduled</0> your consultation on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0> to <0>{{newDate}}</0> from <0>{{newStartHour}}</0> to <0>{{newEndHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_cancellation: You successfully <0>cancelled</0> your consultation with <0>{{providerName}} scheduled</0> on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_cancellation_provider: The provider <0>{{providerName}} cancelled</0> the consultation <0>scheduled</0> on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_suggestion: <0>{{providerName}} suggested</0> a consultation on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_suggestion_booking: You accepted the <0>suggested</0> consultation from <0>{{providerName}}</0> on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>
notifications.consultation_suggestion_cancellation: You rejected the <0>suggested</0> consultation from <0>{{providerName}}</0> on <0>{{date}}</0> from <0>{{startHour}}</0> to <0>{{endHour}}</0>

safety-feedback-block.heading: This is important. Please read and complete
safety-feedback-block.subheading: Please answer all questions that apply truthfully.
safety-feedback-block.warning: With answering you declare that this declaration is true and you make it knowing that making a declaration that you know is untrue is an offence.
safety-feedback-block.q0: Did the provider attend the consultation session?
safety-feedback-block.q1: Did the provider ask you to disclose your address and contact details?
safety-feedback-block.q2: Did the provider ask you to meet them outside of the system (in person or in other application)?
safety-feedback-block.q3: Did the provider ask you to send them any photos of yourself or turn on your video even if you did not want to?
safety-feedback-block.q4: Did you feel unsafe in any way during the session?
safety-feedback-block.q5: How are you feeling about the last consultation session?
safety-feedback-block.q6: Have your needs been addressed properly? 1-10 (No, not at all – Yes, all of them)
safety-feedback-block.q7: Do you understand how you can improve your wellbeing? 1-10 (No, not at all – Yes, all is clear)
safety-feedback-block.q8: Compare your current feeling to how you felt before the session started. How is it? 1-10 (No, it’s much worse – Can’t be better)

payment-status-block.payment_failed_heading: Your payment was not successful, please try again.

provider-overview-page.heading: Provider overview
provider-overview-page.subheading: Detailed overview of the profile of the provider you selected

user-profile-page.heading: Your profile
user-profile-page.subheading: Here you can find all the information you need for your profile and account settings.

not-found-page.heading: Oops! We can't find the page you are looking for...
not-found-page.subheading: It seems this page is missing or is not available at the moment.

contact-us-page.heading: Contact us
contact-us-page.subheading: Here you can report any technical issues.

sos-center-page.heading: Emergency
sos-center-page.subheading: Need help urgently? Please, contact some of the listed centers right now.

select-provider-page.heading: Select a Provider
select-provider-page.subheading: Choose the provider you want to talk to using video, audio or text. It may sometimes take a few sesions to find a provider that is a good fit for your needs and your preferred approach.
select-provider-page.modal_coupon_heading: Enter your coupon to use it
select-provider-page.heading_with_coupon: Select a  Provider to use Coupon: {{coupon}}
select-provider-page.coupon_paragraph: Coupons provide “no-cost” sessions and are sponsored by our partners.
select-provider-page.coupon_paragraph_two: If you received a coupon code from a social media campaign or a partner, please copy and paste that below. After you submit the coupon code, you will see any providers that support it and their availability. A coupon may support one or more sessions. The platform will indicate if the coupon has expired or reached the maximum session usage.

platform-rating-page.heading: Want to rate us?
platform-rating-page.subheading: We’ll be counting stars. Let’s stay honest. Tell us how you feel about this platform. Rate us and leave us your comment.

share-platform-page.heading: Share the application
share-platform-page.subheading: Share the application on your social media, and give more people the chance to help them.

register-anonymous-page.heading: Register anonymously
register-anonymous-page.subheading: You will be registered anonymously. We will not link this account to a physical person in any way.

register-support-page.heading_2: Do you need support right now?

notification-preferences-page.heading: Notification settings
notification-preferences-page.subheading: Here you can manage what type of notification you want to receive or not.

join-consultation.error: An error occured. Please try again

code-verification.heading: Code Verification
code-verification.subheading: Please enter the code you received via email. It is valid for 30 minutes after you received the email.

require-registration.heading: You need to register to use this feature
require-registration.text: You need to create an anonymous or regular account to use all the app features.

require-data-agreement.heading: Do you give us permission to use your data as defined by the privacy policy?
require-data-agreement.text: Your personal information will not be exposed, this permission will be used only for medical data and chat history to be proccesed and stored in the platform.
require-data-agreement.text2: If you would like to learn more about how we process personal data, please visit our

save-access-code-confirmation.heading: Confirm you have saved your access code
save-access-code-confirmation.text: Be sure that you have saved or written down your access code. Otherwise you will lose access to your anonymous account and your progress in the app.
save-access-code-confirmation.warning: I understand, that i will not have access to the account if i lose this code

create-question.heading: Ask your question here
create-question.subheading: Your question will be 100% anonymous and no one will see that you are the author of this question.
create-question.text_area_error_label: Question should be at least 10 characters long

how-it-works-my-qa.heading: How it works
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_1: Client posts an anonymous private message to uSupport in a language of their choice, using the website or app.
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_2: Approved, available uSupport provider responds with relevant pathways, etc.
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_3: Everyone sees the response! It goes into a common area with relevant #tags for future reference.

delete-chat-history.heading: Are you sure you want to delete all your chat data?
delete-chat-history.confirm: Yes, delete all my chat data
delete-chat-history.success: Your chat data has been deleted successfully.

root.heading: Are you still here?
root.text: You've been inactive for a while. For your security, we'll automatically log you out in {{seconds}} seconds.
